title: Gods vvarning to his people of England By the great ouer-flowing of the vvaters or floudes lately hapned in South-wales and many other places. Wherein is described the great losses, and wonderfull damages, that hapned thereby: by the drowning of many townes and villages, to the vtter vndooing of many thousandes of people.
author: Jones, William, of Usk.
publisher: Printed [by R. Blower] for W. Barley, and Io. Bayly, and are to besolde [sic] in Gratious street,
